<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_email</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Test</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// get the current recipient(s)
	var emailTo = current.recipients.split(',');
	for (var i = 0; i < emailTo.length; i++) {
		// look for a user matching a recipient email address
		var userRec = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		userRec.addEncodedQuery('email=' + emailTo[i] + '^u_alternate_emailISNOTEMPTY');
		userRec.query();
		if (userRec.next()) {
			// found one, so add their alternate email
			emailTo.push(userRec.u_alternate_email);
		}
	}
	// save the recipients
	current.recipients = emailTo.join(',');

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-16 14:01:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>43d3e1e5476231107b748a5f746d4363</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_43d3e1e5476231107b748a5f746d4363</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-16 14:01:23</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=43d3e1e5476231107b748a5f746d4363"/></record_update>
